Plan: 1 to modify.

Summary by type:
  tables: 1 to modify

Tables:
  ~ users
    - user_tenant_isolation (policy)
    + user_tenant_isolation (policy)

DDL to be executed:
--------------------------------------------------

DROP POLICY IF EXISTS user_tenant_isolation ON users;

CREATE POLICY user_tenant_isolation ON users FOR SELECT TO PUBLIC USING (tenant_id = 1);
